      • addWaypoint

        @Deprecated
public Planning addWaypoint(AbstractWaypoint point)
        Deprecated. 
        Add a waypoint to the current planning at the best position possible, and update the current routes consequently.
        Parameters:
        point - the waypoint to add to the current planning.
        Returns:
        the updated current planning.

      • addWaypoint

        @Requires(value="!this.waypoints.contains(waypoint)")
public void addWaypoint(AbstractWaypoint waypoint,
                                                                              int index)
        Add a waypoint to the current planning after the given waypoint, and update the current routes consequently.
        Parameters:
        waypoint - The waypoint to add to the current planning.
        index - The index where to add the waypoint. The current waypoint at this index and the following waypoints will be moved by one.

      • addWaypoint

        @Deprecated
 @Requires(value={"!this.waypoints.contains(waypoint)","this.waypoints.contains(afterWaypoint)"})
public void addWaypoint(AbstractWaypoint waypoint,
                                                                                                                                      AbstractWaypoint afterWaypoint)
        Deprecated. 
        Add a waypoint to the current planning after the given waypoint, and update the current routes consequently.
        Parameters:
        waypoint - the waypoint to add to the current planning.
        afterWaypoint - the waypoint after which the new waypoint must be added.

      • removeWaypoint

        @Requires(value={"this.waypoints.contains(waypoint)","!waypoint.equals(this.waypoints.get(0))"})
public void removeWaypoint(AbstractWaypoint waypoint)
        Remove a waypoint to the current planning, and update the current routes consequently. Please not that the removed waypoint can't be the first warehouse.
        Parameters:
        waypoint - The waypoint to remove from the current planning.

      • getWaypoint

        public AbstractWaypoint getWaypoint(int index)
        Get the waypoint of the planning at the given index. The waypoints list is circular, so giving an index greater than the size of the list will still return a waypoint.
        Parameters:
        index - the index at which the wanted waypoint is supposed to be.
        Returns:
        the waypoint at the given index.

      • getWarehouse

        public Warehouse getWarehouse()
        Get the warehouse with which the delivery man will start delivering things.
        Returns:
        the warehouse associated to the planning.

      • computeRoutes

        protected java.util.List<Route> computeRoutes()
        Compute all routes used by the current planning.
        Returns:
        the list of all routes in the planning.

      • updateRoutes

        protected void updateRoutes()
        Update the list of all routes used by the planning.

      • computePlanningWaypoints

        protected java.util.List<PlanningWaypoint> computePlanningWaypoints()
        Transform all waypoints used by the planning into PlanningWayPoint objects.
        Returns:
        the list off all used waypoints in the shape of PlanningWayPoints.

      • updatePlanningWaypoints

        protected void updatePlanningWaypoints()
        Update all waypoints used by the planning.

      • updatePlanningWaypoints

        protected void updatePlanningWaypoints(int startIndex)
        Update all waypoints used by the planning, starting with the waypoint at the given index.
        Parameters:
        startIndex - the index of the first waypoint to update.
